title: Champion freezes 3-10 seconds in game
body: Ever since Invasion came out- patch 7.17- (which is around the time my problem started) my champion would freeze in-game for a few seconds and so far it cost me many trades.  Everything else works fine- my fps and ms. Everything still seems to run smoothly around me (teammates, enemies, etc.) so it's definitely not internet problems. I tried hextech repair and CCleaner but nothing fixed the problem. Can anyone tell me how to fix this????

replies.body:
Those champions freezes sound an awful lot like what happens when your connection is having packet loss issues. Luckily we can test for just that by having our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan the recent network logs from a game that had that weird champion freezes. 

Post a screenshot of what it gives you here so that I can take a look over it with you.
